artist: Etcher: J. F. Borgnet; Painter: After Phillipp Jakob Hackert
description: waterfall with ruins at top of bluff left; 2 figures below in forground; man playing pipe and seated woman; cows at river and one resting in forground
inscription:
Signature, and Inscription

on sheet in black: [36/ Hackert   Borgnet Sc./Du Cabinet de Mr. Poullain];
portfolio: From Cabinet Poullain: Collection de cent-vingt estampes gravés d'après les tableaux & dessins que composoient le Cabinet de Mr. Poullain, plate 36
title: Print
